description: Data breach alerting service Have I Been Pwned (HIBP) warns that SurveyLama suffered a data breach in February 2024, which exposed the sensitive data of 4.4 million users. [...]
title: SurveyLama data breach exposes info of 4.4 million users

description: Omni Hotels & Resorts has confirmed a cyberattack caused a nationwide IT outage that is still affecting its locations. [...]
title: Omni Hotels confirms cyberattack behind ongoing IT outage

description: Chilean data center and hosting provider IxMetro Powerhost has suffered a cyberattack at the hands of a new ransomware gang known as SEXi, which encrypted the company's VMware ESXi servers and backups. [...]
title: Hosting firm's VMware ESXi servers hit by new SEXi ransomware

description: Jackson County, Missouri, is in a state of emergency after a ransomware attack took down some county services on Tuesday. [...]
title: Jackson County in state of emergency after ransomware attack

description: The U.S. Department of State is investigating claims of a cyber incident after a threat actor leaked documents allegedly stolen from a government contractor. [...]
title: US State Department investigates alleged theft of government data

description: A premium WordPress plugin named LayerSlider, used in over one million sites, is vulnerable to unauthenticated SQL injection, requiring admins to prioritize applying security updates for the plugin. [...]
title: Critical flaw in LayerSlider WordPress plugin impacts 1 million sites

description: IT security software company Ivanti has released patches to fix multiple security vulnerabilities impacting its Connect Secure and Policy Secure gateways. [...]
title: Ivanti fixes VPN gateway vulnerability allowing RCE, DoS attacks

description: Google has fixed another zero-day vulnerability in the Chrome browser, which was exploited by security researchers during the Pwn2Own hacking contest last month. [...]
title: Google fixes one more Chrome zero-day exploited at Pwn2Own

description: AT&T is facing multiple class-action lawsuits following the company's admission to a massive data breach that exposed the sensitive data of 73 million current and former customers. [...]
title: AT&T faces lawsuits over data breach affecting 73 million customers

description: Google has fixed two Google Pixel zero-days exploited by forensic firms to unlock phones without a PIN and gain access to the data stored within them. [...]
title: Google fixes two Pixel zero-day flaws exploited by forensics firms

description: Microsoft Copilot is a powerful asset for companies, but with it comes an increased risk of data exposure. In this article, Varonis demonstrates prompt-hacking examples that can expose sensitive data. [...]
title: 6 Prompts You Don't Want Employees Putting in Microsoft Copilot
